cab.content: Circulated by the Secretary of State for India.SECRET. From Viceroy, Foreign Department, lbth December 19.18. (Received 16th, 2 p.ni.) 'Secret. Weekly report. North-West Frontier quiet. Circulated by the Secretary of State for India.SECRET. From Viceroy, Foreign Department, 15th December 1918. (received 16th, 2 p.rri.)Secret. Weekly report. North-West Frontier quiet.
